definition: to bear/to carry/to hold/to continue/to undertake/to take charge/owing to/due to/to receive
surname Cheng/Cheng (c. 2000 BC), third of the legendary Flame Emperors 炎帝[Yan2 di4] descended from Shennong 神農|神农[Shen2 nong2] Farmer God
to establish/to found/to set up/to build/to construct

sentences.english: Cooperating with CRBC, constructing projects of road, Bridge.
sentences.chinese: 与中国路桥合作，承建道路，桥梁工程。

sentences.english: We can contract to build turn-key plant, undertake single items of projects as a subcontractor or provide labor services.
sentences.chinese: 我们可以承建成套工厂或分包单项工程或供给劳务。

sentences.english: The firm tendered for the construction of the new cinema.
sentences.chinese: 这家公司投标承建新电影院。

sentences.english: The penstock construction in Ertan Hydropower Station is undertaken by the German NOELL Company.
sentences.chinese: 二滩水电站压力钢管工程由德国NOELL公司承建。

sentences.english: The contractor is Germany's SMS Demag.
sentences.chinese: 承建商是德国西马克德马格。

sentences.english: It will be run by the Chinese Academy of Agricultural Sciences (CAAS) and is due to open in 2009.
sentences.chinese: 它由中国农业科学院承建，预计2009年开放。

sentences.english: He said China has already appointed contractors for implementation of the projects.
sentences.chinese: 他说，中国已经任命了实施项目的承建商。

sentences.english: We subcontracted  for sanitary-plumbing equipment in the project.
sentences.chinese: 在该项工程中我们分包了卫生设备的承建。

sentences.english: Open Channel and Longitudinal Cofferdam Project Attributed to CGGC.
sentences.chinese: 承建的导流明渠和纵向围堰工程。

sentences.english: "Found" in Des "Moines, " IA roofing roofing contractors and vendors.
sentences.chinese: 发现在德梅因，美国衣阿华屋顶屋面承包商和承建商。

definition: to contract for an entire project
construction/to carry out construction or large-scale repairs
civil engineering/same as 土木工程[tu3 mu4 gong1 cheng2]
to begin work (of a factory or engineering operation)/to start a construction job
to join the two sections (of a linear structure: bridge, dike etc) to complete its construction
